basics.name: Priya Patel
basics.headline: Product Manager & UX Strategist
basics.summary: Experienced product manager with a background in UX design and market research. Passionate about creating user-centered products that solve real problems.

experience.title: Senior Product Manager
experience.description: Leading product strategy and roadmap development for a SaaS platform with over 500,000 users.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Managed the development of mobile applications and conducted user research to inform product decisions.

experience.title: UX Designer
experience.description: Created user flows, wireframes, and prototypes for web and mobile applications.

education.degree: MBA with focus on Technology Management
education.description: President of Product Management Club. Participated in startup incubator program.

education.degree: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Graphic Design
education.description: Minor in Digital Media. Dean's List all semesters.

projects.name: Healthcare App Redesign
projects.description: Led the redesign of a healthcare app that increased user engagement by 45%

projects.name: Product Management Mentorship Program
projects.description: Founded a mentorship program for aspiring product managers

publications.title: User-Centered Product Development: A Practical Guide
Bridging Design and Business: The Role of Product Management

recommendations.author: Alex Rodriguez
recommendations.relationship: VP of Product at TechSolutions Inc
recommendations.text: Priya is an exceptional product manager who combines strategic thinking with a deep understanding of user needs.

recommendations.author: Jennifer Kim
recommendations.text: Working with Priya was a pleasure. Her ability to translate user research into actionable product requirements is outstanding.
